Sentencas: An entire active region of an anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell was structurally analyzed by X-ray computed nano-tomography using full-field transmission X-ray microscopy (NANO-TXM).
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and analysis of an entire solid oxide fuel cell by full-field transmission X-ray microscopy

Sentencas: A total three-dimensional volume of similar to 38,500 mu m(3) was imaged, from which Ni-YSZ anode functional layer (similar to 3650 mu m(3)) and LSM-YSZ cathode functional layer (similar to 4100 mu m(3)) volumes were reconstructed.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and analysis of an entire solid oxide fuel cell by full-field transmission X-ray microscopy

Sentencas: These were among the largest-volume electrode reconstructions ever reported, while at the same time exhibiting high spatial resolution of 50 nm.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and analysis of an entire solid oxide fuel cell by full-field transmission X-ray microscopy

Sentencas: Comparison with electrode microstructures measured using other imaging methods demonstrates that the larger NANO-TXM-measured volumes provided significantly more accurate phase connectivity information.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and analysis of an entire solid oxide fuel cell by full-field transmission X-ray microscopy

Sentencas: A microstructure-based electrochemical model prediction agreed well with the measured full-cell electrochemical data.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and analysis of an entire solid oxide fuel cell by full-field transmission X-ray microscopy

Sentencas: The results suggest that low LSM connectivity and slow oxygen reduction reaction kinetics in the cathode were a major limitation to the overall cell performance.
Titulo: Three-dimensional reconstruction and analysis of an entire solid oxide fuel cell by full-field transmission X-ray microscopy
